name: Number of domestic R&D employees, by selected industry and sex, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2020
description: Number of domestic R&D employees, by selected industry and sex, for companies with 1–9 employees: 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_researchers_including_r_d_scientists_engineers_and_their_managers_
variableMeasured.description: Researchers Including R D Scientists Engineers And Their Managers

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_technicians_and_equivalent_staff
variableMeasured.description: R D Technicians And Equivalent Staff

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_support_staff_clerical_and_other_

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding or unavailable NAICS detail for select records beyond the 4-digit industry classification. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2021 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2020.
